'''''Amon Hen'' 173''' is the one-hundred-and-seventy-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[2002]].

The journal includes a large excerpt from a formerly unpublished [[Letter to Christopher Fettes|letter by J.R.R. Tolkien to Christopher Fettes]].
